name: Fernando da Fonseca de Souza
content: Fernando da Fonseca de Souza Fernando Current Position: Associate Professor at Centro de Informática - Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Research Areas: Databases Human-Computer Interaction Adaptive Systems Informatic for Education Background: Civil Engineer, 1976 - Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Brazil Master in Computer Sciences - 1983, Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Brazil Ph.D. in Computer Sciences - 1992, University of Kent at Canterbury, England Other Data Personal Interest: Theatre Cinema Travelling Music fdfd@cin.ufpe.br Centro de informática Universidade Federal de Pernambuco Av.
